headline: Is Johnson Controls (JCI) Quietly Rewriting Its Core Story Around AI-Era Cooling and Smart Buildings?
summary: In recent days, Johnson Controls International has faced pressure after Nvidiaâ€™s CEO said future AI chips could sharply reduce traditional data-center cooling needs, while the company committed up to US$60.00 million over five years to expand its Singapore Innovation Centre for next-generation thermal management technologies. At the same time, Johnson Controls is highlighting growth initiatives such as AI-enabled retail loss-prevention tools and an expanded smart-building focus, underscoring...
